column4: I USE LSPCI -V AND I GET A DECRIPTION OF MY VIDEO CARD BUT TO INSTALL THE DRIVER AT ati WEB PAGE I MUST DETERMINE THE SERIES WICH MY CARD BELONGS ,THE OUTPUT IS: VGA compatible controller: ATI Technologies Inc Radeon Mobility M6 LY (prog-if 00 [VGA])
Subsystem: Compaq Computer Corporation Evo N600c
dont paste, and dont use caps, also, dont use ati drivers, just the X driver is what you need
the ATI driver does NOT work for your card period.
